segments.text: Hello , could I speak to Mr . Wang , the PR Director ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , speaking . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to inquire about the position of PR manager . What requirements does the job need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The requirements are strong communicational skills , management and work assiduously . And you have to handle the recurring crisis good-humoredly and discreetly .
segments.speaker: S2
